problem.markdown:
>>What was HP's actual production rate before they installed the "Eclipse" system? <<
( ) 370,000 units/month ( ) 125,000 units/month (x) 200,000 units/month
[Explanation] The production rate of the factory when labor was manual was 200,000 units/month. See video 1 for reference.[Explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: What was HP's actual production rate before they installed the "Eclipse" system?

div.p: The production rate of the factory when labor was manual was 200,000 units/month. See video 1 for reference.
